page.title: 06BAY TREE FARM,COCKLAKE
page.content: {TYPE OF FARM }BEEF {OCCUPANTS }MR AND MRS ROSE AND 3 CHILDREN {ANIMALS}70 FRIESIAN HEIFERS, 40 HENS, 20 DUCKS {PRODUCE}100 ACRES GRASS FOR HAY AND GRAZING,5 ACRES CIDER APPLES,EGGS {WORKERS} FARMERS WIFE FULL TIME FARMER PART TIME.CONTRACTORS FOR BAILING AND DITCHING {BUILDINGS}70 COW CUBICLES, 2 CIDER HOUSES, HEN HOUSES ,MACHINERY SHEDS AND HAY BARNS {MACHINERY}1 INTERNATIONAL TRACTOR AND HAYMAKING EQUIPMENT,HEDGER {BUYING AND SELLING}10 CALVES AND 10 DUCKS BOUGHT,10 HEIFERS ,CIDER AND HAY TO BE SOLD {PESTS }FLIES {EXTRA LAND USE} SMALL CARAVAN SITE FOR TOURING CARAVANS
